name: Molly (Snake-a-space)
description:
MOLLY was written as an entry for the reset64 craptastic 2018 4K compo

It was designed and imagined by my 6 year old daughter (also called Molly

You play Deena, a worm astronaught, launched into space to save our beloved snake Tibly,

Tibly normally protects Deena's homeworld from incoming projectiles, however Tibly isn't feeling very well, so as Deena you must protect Tibly while it recouperates.

Use a Joystick in port 2 to leap around on Tibly while catching the falling objects from above,

Each item that falls has a different score, if you miss it and it hits Tibly, your heath will drop, once you have used all 3 hearts it's game over. If you collect a falling heart it will increase your health one heart.

be warned!,

as time passes, Tibly will get more and more aggresive and items will start appearing faster and faster!

Also watch out for "Picki", the rolling pig that lives on Tibly, he's blind and will whizz about randomly, the only way to be safe is to jump over him.

All graphics and music designed by Jamie and Molly Fuller in 2018
